name: Addus HomeCare Corporation
description: Addus HomeCare Corporation is a leading provider of home care services in the United States, dedicated to delivering high-quality care to individuals in need of assistance due to aging, illness, or disability. Founded in 2000, Addus has expanded its footprint through strategic acquisitions and organic growth, establishing a presence in over 25 states. The company focuses on providing personalized home care services, including personal care, skilled nursing, and therapy services, tailored to meet the unique needs of each client. With a mission to enhance the quality of life for its clients, Addus emphasizes compassionate care and reliability, ensuring that clients can remain in the comfort of their own homes. The company is committed to compliance and quality assurance, adhering to the highest standards in healthcare. As the demand for home care services continues to rise with the aging population, Addus is well-positioned to capitalize on this growth, leveraging its extensive network and experienced workforce to deliver exceptional care. The company’s vision extends to being a trusted leader in the home care industry, advocating for the needs of its clients and promoting independence and dignity in the home care experience.
